price: 50. Jie bijo savo Viešpaties virš savęs, ir jie daro tai, kas jiems įsakyta.
arabic: يَخَافُونَ رَبَّهُم مِّن فَوۡقِهِمۡ وَيَفۡعَلُونَ مَا يُؤۡمَرُونَ۩

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yakhāfūna rabbahum min fawqihim wayafʿalūna mā yu'marūna
